table.name: vtiger_roomsmessages
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomsmessages` ( `roomsmessagesid` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `message` longtext, `room_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `msg_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `path` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `filename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `file_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`roomsmessagesid`), KEY `vtiger_roomsmessages_roomsmessagesid_idx` (`roomsmessagesid`) USING BTREE, KEY `vtiger_roomsmessages_room_id_idx` (`room_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_roomsmessagescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomsmessagescf` ( `roomsmessagesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`roomsmessagesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_roomsmessages_status
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomsmessages_status` ( `room_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `msgid` int(11) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `read` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`room_id`,`msgid`,`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: vtiger_roomsmessages_user_field
vtiger_roomsmessages
